publicationStmt.publisher: Yoav Cohen and Maya Ben Tov, Ben-Gurion University

lg.l: So you thought you had me
how could you think you could get away?
Don't you care to see me go?
If you don't want me to leave - just say
But I'm still not sure I'll stay
She's around the corner - can't you smell her?
A Cause I do, and it's too hard to bear
It's not always good to share
Second should come after first, you know
Maybe you're the one to go
